analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0xf9b62aaf66654c04608aa86db2b78a614d2c4dc1.sol#578-595) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/31/0xf9b62aaf66654c04608aa86db2b78a614d2c4dc1.sol#589)

BRDCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0xf9b62aaf66654c04608aa86db2b78a614d2c4dc1.sol#710-719) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(wallet,_ownerTokens) (/unique_chucks/31/0xf9b62aaf66654c04608aa86db2b78a614d2c4dc1.sol#718-719)

BRDCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/31/0xf9b62aaf66654c04608aa86db2b78a614d2c4dc1.sol#811-814) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/31/0xf9b62aaf66654c04608aa86db2b78a614d2c4dc1.sol#812)

BRDCrowdsale.lockupTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0xf9b62aaf66654c04608aa86db2b78a614d2c4dc1.sol#725-743) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(wallet,_ownerTokens) (/unique_chucks/31/0xf9b62aaf66654c04608aa86db2b78a614d2c4dc1.sol#731-732)
	-token.mint(this,_lockupTokens) (/unique_chucks/31/0xf9b62aaf66654c04608aa86db2b78a614d2c4dc1.sol#739)
	-token.mint(_beneficiary,_remainder) (/unique_chucks/31/0xf9b62aaf66654c04608aa86db2b78a614d2c4dc1.sol#742-743)

BRDCrowdsale.unlockTokens (/unique_chucks/31/0xf9b62aaf66654c04608aa86db2b78a614d2c4dc1.sol#751-777) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/31/0xf9b62aaf66654c04608aa86db2b78a614d2c4dc1.sol#774)

BRDCrowdsale.unlockTokens has external calls inside a loop:
	- (_shouldReward,_to,_amount) = lockup.unlock(_i) (/unique_chucks/31/0xf9b62aaf66654c04608aa86db2b78a614d2c4dc1.sol#768-772)

BRDCrowdsale.unlockTokens has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/31/0xf9b62aaf66654c04608aa86db2b78a614d2c4dc1.sol#774)
